meanings.definition: The plural form of 'videoland', meaning a fictional world or setting depicted in a video game or movie.
meanings.sent1: In the videolands of the game, players can embark on exciting adventures.
meanings.sent2: The movie showcased stunning videolands filled with magical creatures.
meanings.sent3: The characters got lost in the videolands, trying to find their way back home.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination turned the backyard into a videolands of endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The videolands in the story were so vivid that they felt almost real.

meanings.definition: To explore or interact with virtual environments through the use of video technology.
meanings.sent1: Gamers love to videolands different worlds and complete quests.
meanings.sent2: Children often videolands new places through educational video games.
meanings.sent3: He videolands the virtual world with enthusiasm, eager to discover hidden treasures.
meanings.sent4: She videolands through the digital realm like an experienced explorer.
meanings.sent5: Videolandsing through the simulation, he felt like a digital pioneer.
